data.message: Hello Facebook, I want to make my facebook profile verified. Can you give me more details please. Thank You :)

replies.message: Hi Seby. Facebook automatically verifies certain accounts to help people find authentic profiles and Pages. We're not currently able to accept requests for verified profiles or Pages from the public. -Chantal

Dear facebook team i have a page and trying to upload near about 12mins long video but after completion of my uploading i got notification that you can't upload a video longer than 40 mins. so please check it and tell me what is the problem. www.facebook.com/qquranrecitresthis is my page

Fix plsss  
 i open my account say this plss fix 

Thank you
Thanks for doing that. We'll look at your request and send you an email as soon as we've made a decision.
